title: Creative Applications of AI
excerpt: How artists, designers, and creators are leveraging generative AI.
content:
AI in Creative Industries

Generative AI is revolutionizing art, design, and creative workflows.

Digital Art

Artists are using AI tools to create stunning visual masterpieces.

Music Generation

AI can now compose original music in various styles and genres.

Design Automation

Designers use AI to generate layouts, color schemes, and prototypes.
